name: Steve Martin in 'The Jerk' Trivia Game | Movies | 15 Questions

questions.text: What is Steve Martin's character's name?
What is the name of the crazy guy who tries to kill Navin?
questions.explanation:
Not revealed.

	'Die, Navin R. Johnson, die!'

questions.text: Navin invents a 'handle' for eyeglasses, so that pressure is not put on the frames. This invention later makes him rich... but what does it come to be called?
questions.correct: Opti Grab & OptiGrab & The Opti Grab & The OptiGrab & opti-grab & the opti-grab
questions.explanation:
Opti Grab & OptiGrab & The Opti Grab & The OptiGrab & opti-grab & the opti-grab.

	He made it first for Stan Fox, a guy he met at the gas station whose glasses kept slipping.

questions.text: How much does Navin get paid per hour at the gas station?
questions.explanation:
$1.10

	'Sorry, I don't work here.' 'Not even for $1.10 an hour?' 'Uh...'

questions.text: Where does Navin get his first 'spontaneous publicity' ('The new _____________'s here!')?
questions.explanation:
phone book & the phone book.

	'I'm somebody now!'

questions.text: What is NOT one of the only things Navin needs as he leaves the house near the end of the film?
questions.explanation:
A blanket.

	He then trades it all for a thermos.

questions.text: What skill does Marie take up, having learned it from a Mexican guy?
questions.explanation:
Knife throwing.

	She tries to throw a knife at a balloon in Navin's mouth.

questions.text: What job does Navin get at the carnival?
questions.correct: The guy at the booth who guesses your weight
options: The guy at the booth where you throw darts at balloons
He doesn't get a job with the carnival
The guy at the booth where you throw a baseball at milk bottles
questions.explanation:
The guy at the booth who guesses your weight.

	'For one dollar, I'll guess your weight, height, or sex!'

questions.text: Why does Navin stop at the gas station?
options: Because he got kicked out of the car he was hitchhiking in
To get gas for his car
He wanted to get a job

questions.text: Fill in the blank: 'It's a small blue Chevy, a two-door...I can't make out the license plate from here, but it's dragging a small ________ behind it.'
questions.explanation:
church.

	He calls the police to apprehend some {thieves;} he had run a rope from the back bumper of their car to a water spigot on a nearby church. As the car left, it dragged the church along. (Yeah, right.)

questions.text: Who reads Navin's letters to the whole family at home?
Navin: 'You look so beautiful and peaceful, you almost look dead. And I'm glad, because there's something I want to say that's always been very difficult for me to say.' What does he say?
questions.correct: I slit the sheet, the sheet I slit, and on the slitted sheet I sit.
options: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers. A peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked. If Peter
questions.explanation: I slit the sheet, the sheet I slit, and on the slitted sheet I sit.

questions.text: After the crazy killer corners Navin, what does the killer say?
questions.correct: You need to sign for this.
options: Hello. Would you be willing to make a small donation to the Red Cross?
questions.explanation: You need to sign for this.

questions.text: And our last question: What song does Marie hear on the radio that 'reminded (her) of the way we were'?
questions.correct: The Way We Were & Way We Were
questions.explanation:
The Way We Were & Way We Were.

	I hope you enjoyed this quiz.
